name: ManageEnterpriseSecurityFeature
description:
Enable or disable a security feature for an enterprise.

Use this tool to enable or disable a specified security feature across all repositories within an enterprise. Requires administrative access and an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name or the enterprise ID.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: security_feature
parameters.description: Specify the security feature to enable or disable. Options: 'advanced_security', 'secret_scanning', 'secret_scanning_push_protection'.

value_schema.description: The security feature to enable or disable.

parameters.name: set_enablement_status
parameters.description: Specify 'enable_all' to activate or 'disable_all' to deactivate the security feature for all repositories in the enterprise.

value_schema.description:
The action to take.

`enable_all` means to enable the specified security feature for all repositories in the enterprise.
`disable_all` means to disable the specified security feature for all repositories in the enterprise.
